subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony played 40 minutes and scored 25 points and Andrea Bargnani scored 20 points and had a season-high 11 rebounds as the Knicks beat the Hawks in Atlanta.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony played 40 minutes and scored 25 points and Andrea Bargnani scored 20 points and had a season-high 11 rebounds as the Knicks beat the Hawks in Atlanta.
